//ZATLAS1C JOB (12345678),ZATLAS1,MSGCLASS=H,
//        MSGLEVEL=(1,1),CLASS=A,NOTIFY=&SYSUID
//* AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED JCL AS PART AS PCRE2 PORT TO NATIVE Z/OS
// SET PCREHLQ=ZATLAS1
// SET PCREMLQ=PCRE2
// SET PCRESRC=SRCE
// SET PCREJCL=JCLLIB
// SET PCREPRM=CNTLLIB
// SET PCRELOAD=LOADLIB
// SET MEMBER=IBMSAMPL
//STEP1 EXEC EDCCL,CPARM2='OPTFILE(DD:OPTFILE)',
//      CPARM3=CSECT(&MEMBER)
//COMPILE.SYSIN DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCRESRC(&MEMBER),DISP=SHR
//USERLIB  DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCRESRC,DISP=SHR
//COMPILE.SYSCRPT DD SYSOUT=*
//* BOTH OPTFILES DEFAULT TO NO NATIVE POSIX IN PCOBAPI2
//* OPTFIL1 DEFAULTS TO PCRE2 POSIX IN IBMSAMPL BY USING
//* UNDEF(COMPILE_WITH_PCRE2)
//* DEF(COMPILE_WITH_PCRE2) AS IN OPTFILE WILL TURN IBMSAMPL TO NATIVE
//* POSIX
//*OPTFILE DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCREJCL(OPTFILE),DISP=SHR
//OPTFILE DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCREJCL(OPTFIL1),DISP=SHR
//LKED.SYSLIB  DD
//        DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCRELOAD,DISP=SHR
//LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCRELOAD(&MEMBER),DISP=SHR
//SYSIN DD DSN=&PCREHLQ..&PCREMLQ..&PCREPRM(&MEMBER),DISP=SHR
